trans-unit.source: Sets the system wave volume by percent.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the system wave volume by percent.

target.mrk: Sets the system wave volume by percent.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to 1 if percent is invalid.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to 1 if percent is invalid.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to 1 if percent is invalid.

trans-unit.source: This controls the Wave volume, not the master volume control. Also, a value of Zero does not set mute status.

seg-source.mrk: This controls the Wave volume, not the master volume control.
Also, a value of Zero does not set mute status.

target.mrk: This controls the Wave volume, not the master volume control.
Also, a value of Zero does not set mute status.

trans-unit.source: On Windows Vista, there is no system-wide wave volume. This function only changes the wave volume for the script. It can not be used to change the wave volume of other programs.

seg-source.mrk: On Windows Vista, there is no system-wide wave volume.
This function only changes the wave volume for the script.
It can not be used to change the wave volume of other programs.

target.mrk: On Windows Vista, there is no system-wide wave volume.
This function only changes the wave volume for the script.
It can not be used to change the wave volume of other programs.
